valworkbench.datatypes
Class ClusterMatrix

java.lang.Object
  valworkbench.datatypes.ClusterMatrix

public class ClusterMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

The ClusterMatrix class provides an object representing a clustering Matrix. A ClusterMatrix type object contains a Matrix with the following fields: 'nOfCluster' (an integer representing the number of clusters), 'clusterSize' (an integer vector containing, for each cell, the number of items for each cluster), 'clusterMatrix' (a matrix containing, for each row, indices value of items, belonging to the cluster corresponding to the index row of the matrix).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Davide Scaturro, Filippo Utro
